name: Three-Cheese Chicken Penne Pasta Bake
author: Philadelphia
summary: Chunks of chicken in a creamy tomato sauce with basil and fresh spinach are baked with multi-grain penne pasta and topped with cheese.
ingredients: 1 ½ cups multi-grain penne pasta, uncooked
1 pound boneless skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-sized pieces
1 cup KRAFT 2% Milk Shredded Mozzarella Cheese, divided
directions: Cook pasta in large saucepan as directed on package, omitting salt and adding spinach to the boiling water for the last minute
Meanwhile, cook and stir chicken and basil in large nonstick skillet sprayed with cooking spray on medium-high heat 3 min
Stir in tomatoes and spaghetti sauce; bring to boil
or until chicken is done, stirring occasionally
Drain pasta mixture; return to pan
Stir in chicken mixture and 1/2 cup mozzarella; pour into 2-qt
or until heated through; top with remaining cheeses
